title: Large coworking space with panoramic views, outlets and USB ports
posting_body: ['$500 Security Deposit with Approved Credit', "The Elements at Sloan's Lake", '1590 Yates St, Denver, CO, 80204', 'Visit This Website to See More:', '<URL>', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'x 31', 'OR Text', '31', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to text our team.', "Welcome Home to The Elements at Sloan's Lake Apartments", 'This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 550 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Living well at The elements extends to the great outdoors.', 'Breathe in the natural beauty of majestic mountaintops and the sprawling lake just outside your front door.', 'For those seeking an active, adventurous lifestyle, enjoy kayaking, hiking, and boating on the lake, or venture out for some whitewater rafting, expert rock climbing, and horseback riding.', 'And, within minutes you can enjoy popular boutiques, restaurants, and entertainment venues in downtown Denver.', 'Features', "- The elements at Sloan's lake is undergoing a transformation.", 'Apartments on the 8th through 14th Floors - all with stunning views of the mountains and the city - will be fully renovated and feature a number of amenities.', '- There are three options for renovation styles.', 'The "Retro" Style maintains all the elements we loved from the mid-century era, updated with stylish, contemporary finishes and all with stunning views.', 'The "Premium" apartments on the 11th floors are completed renovated residences with upgraded kitchens, spa bathroom features, and unparalleled views.', 'The "Penthouse" Style on Floors 13th & 14th are the most luxurious residences featuring open concept space plans, deluxe kitchens, spa bath design, surrounded by picturesque mountain and cityscape views.', '*LED Lighting (All)', '*Luxury carpeting (Premium)', '*Built in USB ports (Premium + Penthouse)', '*Smark Lock Entry (All)', '*Nostalgic 50s style kitchen steel cabinets (Retro + Penthouse)', '*Custom maple finish kitchen cabinets (Premium)', '*Quartz Countertops and Tile Backsplash (Premium)', '*Smart Lock Entry (All)', '*Stainless steel appliances (All)', '*Large Kitchen Island and Dining Bar (Premium + Penthouse)', '*Upgraded Bathroom Renovation with Ceramic Tile Shower (All)', '*Spa Style Bath with Floating Vanity (Premium + Penthouse)', '*Pendant lighting in kitchen (Premium)', '*Custom Modern Countertops (Retro)', '*Vinyl Wood Plank Flooring (All)', 'Community Amenities', '- 1-bedroom hospitality suite rental available for friends and family', '- Spacious outdoor lounge and fire pit with a view of the Denver city skyline', '- Outdoor space for programmed fitness, yoga and stretching overlooking the Rockies', '- Private meeting space with audio-visual connectivity', '- Community kitchenette with coffee service and refrigerator', '- Secure key fob entry to the building and residences', '- Top of the line fitness center featuring a Peloton bike', '- Large coworking space with panoramic views, outlets and USB ports', '- Outdoor grilling and dining area with sweeping views of the mountains', '- Bike, ski and snowboard storage', 'onsite with repair tools (coming Fall 2020)', '- Beautifully Appointed Penthouse Lounge', '- Onsite Pet Grooming Station (coming Fall 2020)', '- Modern mail center and parcel storage with automatic notification system', 'Office Hours', 'Monday-Friday:10:00AM-6:00PM', 'Saturday:10:00AM-5:00PM', 'Pet Policy', 'We love your pets and are excited to welcome them to their new home!', 'We allow TWO pets per apartment home!', 'Pet Deposit for 1 Pet: $100', 'Pet Fee for 1 Pet: $250', 'Monthly Pet Rent for 1 Pet: $35', 'Pet Deposit for 2 Pets: $200', 'Pet Fee for 2 Pets: $400', 'Monthly Pet Rent for 2 Pets: $65', 'Income Requirements:', 'Minium of 2.5x the monthly rent', 'xFSH5IPu']
